node.name: AppLaud PhoneGap for Android with JSLint/JSHint
node.shortdescription:
An Eclipse plugin to enable Web developers to easily create Android apps. The plugin works with the Android Development Tools and the PhoneGap framework to provide a comprehensive IDE for Android development:

  • Project support for JavaScript, HTML and CSS files
  • Built on Eclipse JSDT (JavaScript Development Tools)
  • UI Framework Integration - currently jQuery Mobile and Sencha Touch
  • Automatic build environment
  • Easy target and emulator deployment
  • Single environment for hybrid development when Java is desired

MDS 1.2 adds integrated JSLint/JSHint via the jslint4java feature

The Android Development Tools are a prerequisite install available via https://dl-ssl.google.com/android/eclipse/

MDS 1.2 Release summary at http://bit.ly/fUGP5w

Mailing List at http://groups.google.com/group/eclipse-plugin-for-phonegap
Code Headquarters at http://code.google.com/a/eclipselabs.org/p/mobile-web-development-with-p...
node.body:
An Eclipse plugin to enable Web developers to easily create Android apps. The plugin works with the Android Development Tools and the PhoneGap framework to provide a comprehensive IDE for Android development:

  • Project support for JavaScript, HTML and CSS files
  • Built on Eclipse JSDT (JavaScript Development Tools)
  • UI Framework Integration - currently jQuery Mobile and Sencha Touch
  • Automatic build environment
  • Easy target and emulator deployment
  • Single environment for hybrid development when Java is desired

MDS 1.2 adds integrated JSLint/JSHint via the jslint4java feature

The Android Development Tools are a prerequisite install available via https://dl-ssl.google.com/android/eclipse/

MDS 1.2 Release summary at http://bit.ly/fUGP5w

Mailing List at http://groups.google.com/group/eclipse-plugin-for-phonegap
Code Headquarters at http://code.google.com/a/eclipselabs.org/p/mobile-web-development-with-p...
